title: *BRAND NEW 55+ COMMUNITY. ONE MONTH FREE! CALL AND APPLY TODAY!*
posting_body: ['7011 McKinney Falls Pkwy, Austin, TX 78744', 'Limestone Ridge has exceptional one and two bedroom floor plans that are carefully crafted for your satisfaction.', 'Choose from spacious options featuring quality amenities such as an all-electric kitchen, balcony or patio,  walk-in closets, and washer and dryer connections.', 'Sure to exceed your expectations, our affordable senior apartments for rent are matchless in affordability and efficiency.', 'With a unique combination of style and comfort, our community is the perfect place to call home.', 'We are dedicated to providing an atmosphere of relaxation and enjoyment.', 'Our senior residents have access to a fantastic selection of premium community amenities including a swimming pool, clubhouse, and business center.', 'Experience the active adult lifestyle you’ve been dreaming of at Limestone Ridge', 'Senior Living apartments in Austin, TX.', 'Be a part of the excitement and apply today!', 'Apartment Features:', 'Curtains', 'Balcony or Patio', 'Disability Access', 'Central Air and Heating', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Refrigerator', 'Community Features:', 'Clubhouse', 'Gated Access', 'Senior and Military Discounts Available', 'Elevator', 'Business Center', 'Disability Access', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
